page.title: 11RELIGIOUS BELIEFS
page.content: Here are some extracts of what l2-l3 year olds believe:- "I believe there is a god and he did send his son to earth but I don't see why we should go to mass to praise Jesus because you could do the same in your own home. I only go to mass because my Dad tells me to go" "I believe there is a Heaven and a Hell and that there will be a judgement day when Jesus will come to the earth again and tell people their sins, and whether they will go to Heaven or Hell. I hope that I go to Heaven and not to Hell. I don't suppose anybody would like to go to Hell". "I believe that there is a God but, I also doubt that there is a God because he lets all the Ethiopians suffer and starve and slowly die".
